Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Inscribed tablet
Description: Tablet grooved on its contour and pierced longitudinally. One of the surface bears a frieze of nefer (''beautiful, good, perfect'') and djed (''stability'') signs. The other surface features two nefer signs and two flowers surrounding a third nefer sign.  All these symbols are prophylactic.
